uniovi.assign.reports

Class Reporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniovi.assign.reports.Reporter

  • public class Reporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class in charge of generating real time reports about the status of the algorithm during its execution and at the end of the execution.

      • printStatsTable

        public void printStatsTable(Population population,
                            int generation)
        Prints an ascii table in console showing statistics of the population passed as parameter.
        Parameters:
        population - from which we want to generate the stats table.
        generation - number of the generation in which the population was generated.

        public void updateCharts(Population population,
                         int generation)
        Updates the charts with the values obtained in the last generation.
        Parameters:
        population - population created in the last generation.
        generation - number of the last generation.

                                long executionTime,
                                int processID)
        Stores all the information about the evolution of the algorithm's execution in a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        geneticParameters - parameters used in the genetic algorithm.
        executionTime - total execution time.
        processID - process identifier.

      • generateAlgorithmResults

        public void generateAlgorithmResults(Population population,
                                     GeneticParameters parameters)
        Generates the files with the final results of the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        population - last population evaluated by the algorithm.
